title: Amphibian Boots
summaries: The Amphibian Boots are an accessory crafted by combining the Sailfish Boots and Frog Leg at a Tinkerer's Workshop. It provides the benefits of both.
Equipping it has the following effects:

• Increases the player's maximum movement speed to 22.5 tiles/second (31 mph)
  • Allows auto-jumping
  • Increases the maximum safe falling distance by 10 tiles
  • Increases jump speed by 1.6

statistics.Tooltip:
The wearer can run super fast
Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump
Increases fall resistance
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
